ghostPost.title: Wrong field with group
ghostPost.excerpt: If your MySQL database is misconfigured, you will see error messages and will need to run some commands to resolve the issue.
ghostPost.meta_title: How to resolve "ER_WRONG_FIELD_WITH_GROUP" errors in Ghost - FAQ
ghostPost.meta_description: If your MySQL database is misconfigured, you will see error messages and will need to run some commands to resolve the issue.

primary_tag.name: Errors
primary_tag.description: Troubleshoot common errors and issues for the open source Ghost publishing platform!

ghostPost.plaintext:
If your MySQL database is misconfigured, you will see error messages such as: 

ER_WRONG_FIELD_WITH_GROUP

...which is not functionally dependent on columns in GROUP BY clause; this is incompatible with sql_mode=only_full_group_by...


To fix
Openmy.cnf  (sudo find / -name my.cnf) and remove only_full_group_by  from 
sql_mode.

For a full list of CLI error messages read the Ghost-CLI guide
[https://docs.ghost.org/api/ghost-cli/].
ghostPost.html:
If your MySQL database is misconfigured, you will see error messages such as:

ER_WRONG_FIELD_WITH_GROUP

...which is not functionally dependent on columns in GROUP BY clause; this is incompatible with sql_mode=only_full_group_by...

To fix

Openmy.cnf (sudo find / -name my.cnf) and remove only_full_group_by from sql_mode.

For a full list of CLI error messages read the Ghost-CLI guide.
